ygData.subject: RE: A bit o help
ygData.msgSnippet: The mask is such an interesting item that I have wanted it for as long as I can remember. I finally picked one up about a week ago (pre-patch).  I use the
ygData.messageBody:
The mask is such an interesting item that I have wanted it for as long as I
can remember. I finally picked one up about a week ago (pre-patch). I use
the illusion every time it becomes night in Norrath for the ultravision and
I dig the +13cha a lot. All I have to say about this whole nonsense I read
on the usenet today is that I am very very very glad it was not taken away
from the bards.

I am terribly proud to wear my elf-hide gloves, trollhide belt, and guise of
the deceiver, as these are the only mid-level bard only (well and rogue
but...) items in game. Other classes are comparing this change to the box
of abukar change though and I think there is going to be a lot of stink over
it, but not on our list of course <grins>

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dave Gaines [mailto:dave@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 8:57 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] A bit o help
>
>
> From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
> Yes, the new mask is truely bard/rogue only. No more wizards right
> cliking and getting dark elf look. Brad even commented on the mask
> in his infamous Nerf vs. Enhancement post.
>
> >
> > From: Jason Osborne <jasono@...>
> >
> > What do yo mean by "NEW mask?" Does the assassin drop a
> different mask than
> > the Guise of the Deceiver now?
> >
> > -- Laena, Lvl 28 E'ci
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Joshua R. Moore [mailto:josh@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 9:48 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] A bit o help
> >
> >
> > From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
> >
> > I have a boon to ask of ye, me friends.
> > I have need of a better map to the ruins of lower Guk. The
> maps I have found
> > from the many cartographers around fail to lead me true.
> > Any help you may offer in this manner would be greatly appreciated.
> > -Martyn
> >
> > [OOC: The maps out there that I have found fail to show the
> Assassin room. I
> > would love to be able to get there, or near, to get a
> basalt Carapace to
> > wear (and perhaps one of the new masks)
> > I was in lower Guk much of last night, and both were up for
> free loot, but I
> > could not find a guide to the assassin room. by the time I
> did find a guide
> > (a few hours later), There were only 20 people in the zone,
> and bad things
> > were everywhere. I did get greaves and gauntlets. Much
> better to wear than
> > bronze]
> >
